Name: CSV/Excel Export Assistant
Function: Outputs clean DataFrame to downloadable CSV or XLSX.

Name: JSON Structuring Assistant
Function: Converts data into nested JSON formats based on schema.

Name: SQL Table Generator
Function: Generates CREATE TABLE + INSERT scripts from the DataFrame.

Name: BigQuery Formatter
Function: Outputs schema and data as BigQuery-compatible JSON or SQL.

Name: API Payload Preparer
Function: Formats rows for use as JSON payloads to external APIs.

Name: Streaming Output Generator
Function: Sends data in chunks (e.g., for Kafka, webhooks, batch APIs).

Name: ETL Batch Packager
Function: Packages filtered data with metadata and logging for ETL drops.

Name: Data Snapshot Archiver
Function: Saves and versions historical data snapshots with timestamping.

Name: Data Contract Exporter
Function: Outputs schema + validation rules in contract-ready format.

Name: Pipeline Trigger Assistant
Function: Sends webhooks or signals to trigger downstream pipelines or notebooks.
